TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: can I have mine changed to Kenbobo
Done & done. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

*Recently noticed that the "L" in my name was capitalized.*

*Current: BLackHat*

*Correct: BlackHat*

*Can you please make this change.*

> 
> *Recently noticed that the "L" in my name was capitalized.*
> *Current: BLackHat*
> 
> *Correct: BlackHat*
> 
> *Can you please make this change.*

It appears a moderator beat me to even reading your request, and it seems it was done. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Uh oh...

> 
> can I have mine changed to Kenbobo

> 
> ***K***enbobo

Who goofed? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Well, to keep up with every other IGN I have, can my username be changed to " Jeremy\_Kerman " ?

Hopefully on topic question:

If I request a name change and it is granted then does that mean some new person can come along and make another account with my **old** display name?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-03T11:21:24Z" title="07/03/2015 11:21  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 3, 2015</time> by OddFunction**

> 
> Hopefully on top question:
> If I request a name change and it is granted then does that mean some new person can come along and make another account with my **old** display name?

that...is a very good question, which I do not know the answer to. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Good question mega\_newblar, the answer is "no".

We keep a record of name changes and the moderators are pretty good at remembering who people used to be, so requests to be renamed to an old member's name are denied.

Jeremy\_Pili, that's one name change we can't do, sorry, Squad doesn't want any more people using Kerman in their name, the ones you do see are very old accounts and I really should get around to messaging them all about a name change, though Damion Rayne did say "better late than never", once, possibly in relation to something else, but I took it to heart.

So anything\* but Kerman.

\*anything allowable by the rules.

I would like my name changed to OddFunction with the capital letters as such.

That is my steam name and name on other forums, I really have no attachment to the newblar name ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Oh, alright, I thought mega\_newblar was kinda cool, you'll need to login with OddFunction from now on.
Should I change my name? I want to consider it before I do it.

> 
> Should I change my name? I want to consider it before I do it.

It is entirely up to you. If you like a different username better than your current one, then by all means change it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
That is fine, it's quite understandable actually.

> 
> Should I change my name? I want to consider it before I do it.

Listen, if you do change your name, I want first dibs on the old one, "Kaboom" is an excellent name for this game.

Even Jeb has adopted it...

Jeb "Kaboom' Kerman

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Listen, if you do change your name, I want first dibs on the old one, "Kaboom" is an excellent name for this game.
> Even Jeb has adopted it...
> 
> Jeb "Kaboom' Kerman
> 
> ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I guess I'll not XD

Oh Oh Oh!

Can I change my username to Kozak?

It popped into my head a while back while playing KSP and i really like it, not my real name either, win win? maybe? i think?

If that's not allowed, dang ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

P.S. dont screw up the capitalization ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

You, sir, are a spoil sport. I guess I'll have to cancel those 1 million business cards I was having printed.

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Why can you only change your name once? Is it a technical thing, or is it so people won't change them 5 times a day?
Fairly sure its to make sure people know who's who and dont have to constantly remember new names

Both probably.
